data.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
data.text:
Kill Bill Vol. 2 is 2004 feature film which was the second part of director Quentin Tarantino's "Kill Bill" saga that began with 2003's Kill Bill Vol. 1. Uma Thurman returns as "The Bride" for the 2004 film as she continues to exact revenge on her fellow assassins and her former boss "Bill" (David Carradine), who massacred her entire wedding party and left her for dead.

The following weapons were used in the film Kill Bill Vol. 2:

Handguns

Star Firestar M-45

The Bride (Uma Thurman) packs a stainless Star Firestar in .45 ACP with a custom extended barrel.

Custom EMF Hartford 'Pinkerton' (Bird's Head Grip)

Bill (David Carradine) packs a nickel plated EMF Hartford Pinkerton revolver with a "Bird's Head" grip modification. It has a custom muzzle brake or mock suppressor added on.

Rifles

M4A1

Seen briefly and barely at the wedding massacre scene are M4A1s in the hands of Bill's assassins.

Shotguns

Sawed-off Remington 870

A sawed-off Remington 870 is used by the assassin Karen Kim (Helen Kim) when confronting Beatrix Kiddo in her hotel room.

Double Barrel Shotgun

Budd (Michael Madsen) packs a 12 Gauge Double Barreled Shotgun, which he loads up with pure rock salt, firing both barrels simultaneously into the Bride's chest.

Mossberg 500
